short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: languages with word by word translation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
interlate gives you word by word translations for languages you don't speak (yet), so you can read and get the gist of what's going on, and maybe pick up some words along the way.

to use interlate you need the google dictionary extension: 
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/google-dictionary-by-goog/mgijmajocgfcbeboacabfgobmjgjcoja
